question: Communication between doctors involved in your treatment helps provide the safest and most effective healthcare. Are you happy for us to inform your GP about this treatment?

Please provide us with the contact details of your GP, in particular their name and fax number (name, house number, street, town, postcode, fax number). Use the box below to search for your GP using your post code... Or add your GP contact details manually.
I confirm and agree that any treatment prescribed for me is for my personal use only.
